product_name: SP Gadgets Power Bar Duo Battery Charger
long_description: No matter where you roam, the sleek and compact SP Gadgets Power Bar Duo Battery Charger is your mobile charging station for 2 HERO3 or HERO3+ batteries (sold separately) and many other USB devices.
short_description: No matter where you roam, the sleek and compact SP Gadgets Power Bar Duo Battery Charger is your mobile charging station for 2 HERO3 or HERO3+ batteries (sold separately) and many other USB devices.
